list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a body's relative mass or the quantity of matter contained by it, giving rise to a downward force; the heaviness of a person or thing.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was at least 175 pounds in weight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta nặng ít nhất 175 pounds

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of metal known to weigh a definite amount and used on scales to determine how heavy an object or quantity of a substance is.
the ability of someone or something to influence decisions or actions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a recommendation by the committee will carry great weight
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một khuyến nghị của ủy ban sẽ mang trọng lượng lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the surface density of cloth, used as a measure of its quality.
hold (something) down by placing a heavy object on top of it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a mug half filled with coffee weighted down a stack of papers
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một nửa cốc chứa đầy cà phê trọng lượng xuống một đống giấy tờ

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: speaking, reading, and writing should be weighted equally in the assessment
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nói, đọc và viết nên được cân bằng trong đánh giá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: assign a handicap weight to (a horse).
treat (a fabric) with a substance to make it seem thicker and heavier.
